content.text: Match ends, Racing de Santander 3, Hércules 0.
Second Half ends, Racing de Santander 3, Hércules 0.
Offside, Hércules. Peña tries a through ball, but Javier Portillo is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Jairo Samperio (Racing de Santander) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Óscar Pérez.

Goal!  Racing de Santander 3, Hércules 0. Óscar Pérez (Racing de Santander) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Jairo Samperio with a through ball following a fast break.
Héctor Yuste (Racing de Santander) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Adrián Sardinero (Hércules).
Substitution, Racing de Santander. Óscar Pérez replaces David Ferreiro.

Goal!  Racing de Santander 2, Hércules 0. Jairo Samperio (Racing de Santander) right footed shot from outside the box to the top right corner. Assisted by David Ferreiro.
Attempt saved. Javier Portillo (Hércules) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Mario Rosas with a through ball.
